trans-unit.source: Sign up cannot be completed without a valid password
trans-unit.target: Inscrição não pode ser compltada sem uma senha válida

trans-unit.note: Message that indicates the app is signing users into their user accounts
Message that indicates the app has successfully completed signing out Message that indicates the app is signing users out of their accounts
Tap to set location. (old key: SetLocation)

trans-unit.id: The app will now sign out
trans-unit.source: The app will now sign out
trans-unit.note: Message that indicates the app is about to sign users out of their user accounts
user location button - follow with heading
Message that shows app is updating trip after user finalised bookings

trans-unit.target: Falta de valores nos campos requeridos.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that some values are missing from the required fields in a booking form.
Every weekday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Every weekend day in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Indicator for unknow if service or station is wheelchair accessible or not

trans-unit.id: Would you like to report a problem?
trans-unit.source: Would you like to report a problem?
trans-unit.note: Question asked when user is taking a screenshot

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa concordar com os termos de condições de reserva.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: Voce precisa concordar com os termos de condições e seguro.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C for insurance must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Voce anteriormente negou o acesso deste app ao seu calendário. Por favor, acione Configurações > Privacidade> Calendário e autorizar este aplicativo para usar este recurso.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Você anteriormente negou o acesso desse aplicativo aos seus contatos. Por favor, acione configurações de aplicativos > Privacidade > Contatos e autorizar este aplicativo para usar este recurso.

trans-unit.note: Indicator that an event is all-day
Estimated time of arrival; parameter is time, e.g., 'arrives 15:30'
Estimated time of departure; parameter is time, e.g., 'departs 15:30'
Credit card expiry date placeholder, mm/yy
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Number of alerts, in this case, there are multiple (plural
Indicator for how cycle-friendly a cycling route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a vehicle, if there are 2 stops or more, e.g., '10 stops'. (old key: Stops)
For describing a time interval, e.g., '8:30 to 8:43' From %time1 to %time2. (old key: TimeFromToShortFormat)
Indicator for how wheelchair-friendly a wheeelchair route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a stop, if there's just 1 stop.
Prefix for selected 'arrive by' time Single line instruction to arrive
'%@' will be replaced with the arrival time. (old key: ArrivalTime)
The first '%@' will be replaced with the place of arrival, the second with the time. (old key: ArrivalLocationTime)
Title for when you'll arrive when on a trip. Countdown to arrival will be displayed below.
'At %location' indicator for parts of a trip that happen at a single location, e.g., waiting at a platform, parking at a car park. (old key: PrimaryLocationStationary)
Action title for calling provider of name. (old key: CallTaxiFormat)

trans-unit.id: Connect to Internet to get trips
trans-unit.source: Connect to Internet to get trips
trans-unit.target: Conectar a Internet para obter viagens
trans-unit.note: Single line instruction if device is offline and user needs to reconnect to internet to calculate trips

trans-unit.target: Não foi possivel encontar parada de trânsito.
trans-unit.note: Error title when server could not find a given transit stop.
To disconnect/unlink from a service provider, e.g., Uber
As in 'this bus/train has few seats available'
Indicating a path is wheelchair/cycyling friendly
As in 'this bus/train is full and likely can't accept further passengers'
Action button title for getting turn-by-turn directions
First '%@' will be replaced with destination location, second with arrival at that location. (old key: MessageArrivalTime)

trans-unit.target: Eu vou pegar o %@ as %@ de %@.
trans-unit.note: Indication of an activity. (old key: ActivityIndication)

trans-unit.id: In the meantime, let's keep exploring %@ and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.source: In the meantime, let's keep exploring %@ and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.target: Entretanto, vamos explorar %@ e aproveitar suas viagens

trans-unit.id: In the meantime, let's keep exploring and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.source: In the meantime, let's keep exploring and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.target: Entretanto, vamos explorar e aproveitar suas viagens

trans-unit.note: Prefix for selected 'leave after' time Single line instruction to leave
The place of departure. (old key: LeaveLocation)
The place of departure with time. (old key: LeaveLocationTime)
Title for when to depart. Countdown to departure will be displayed below.
As in 'this bus/train is so full, there's only limited standing room'
Title to show while loading/waiting for results
As in 'this bus/train has many seats available'
Title of button to get more details about an alert
Indicating no trips have been planned within the next 24 hrs
As in 'this bus/train is full and definitely not accepting further passengers'
Indicator to show when a service is on time according to real-time data.

trans-unit.id: Plan a trip and it will show up here.
trans-unit.source: Plan a trip and it will show up here.
trans-unit.target: Planejar uma viagem e ele aparecerá aqui.

trans-unit.id: Search for this stop again or try again later..
trans-unit.source: Search for this stop again or try again later..
trans-unit.target: Pesquisar essa parada novamente ou tentar mais tarde.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when when server could not find a given transit stop.
Set up to connect/link to a service provider, e.g., Uber
Title for button that, when tapped, shows something, e.g., a list of alert
As in 'this bus/train is fairly full and has standing room only'
Destination location. For trip titles, e.g., 'To work'. (old key: PrimaryLocationEnd)
Indicating a path is wheelchair/cycyling unfriendly
Indicating the wheelchair/cycling friendliness of a path is unknown

trans-unit.id: We are busy getting your upcoming trip. Please wait...
trans-unit.source: We are busy getting your upcoming trip. Please wait...
trans-unit.target: Estamos ocupados recibiendo su próximo viaje. Por favor espera...

trans-unit.id: We'll keep you updated with the latest transit alerts here
trans-unit.source: We'll keep you updated with the latest transit alerts here
trans-unit.target: Vamos mantê-lo atualizado com as mais recentes alertas de trânsito aqui

trans-unit.note: Time of the bus departure. (old key: DepartureTime)
Text indiction for how long a segment might take, where '%@' will be replaced with a duration. E.g., the instruction 'Take bus' might have this next to it as 'for 10 minutes'.
